root.name: Air
root.description: Story Unlike most other visual novels the story is split into three parts: Dream, Summer and Air. Also Summer and Air are linear stories, that are unlocked after finishing all three good endings of the Dream part. Dream Summer Air Adaptations The game was later adapted into a manga, a series of drama cds, an anime series and an anime feature film.
